unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali Cheer, But Will It Last?**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali Cheer, But Will It Last?**

unnormalised: Delhi: Looks like Diwali might be a little brighter this year! News is buzzing about a potential dip in gas cylinder prices. Sources say Bharat Petroleum, Indian Oil, and Hindustan Petroleum are all considering revising prices downwards.
normalised: Delhi: Looks like Diwali might be a little brighter this year! News is buzzing about a potential dip in gas cylinder prices. Sources say B P, Indian Oil, and Hindustan Petroleum are all considering revising prices downwards.

unnormalised: While the exact figure is still under wraps, whispers around the chai stalls suggest a possible reduction of Rs. 200-300 per cylinder. That's enough to make a good batch of biryani!
normalised: While the exact figure is still under wraps, whispers around the chai stalls suggest a possible reduction of rupees two hundred to three hundred per cylinder. That's enough to make a good batch of biryani!

unnormalised: Of course, this comes after a pretty rough patch, with prices hitting record highs. Many households in Kerala were feeling the pinch, especially with Onam celebrations around the corner.
normalised: Of course, this comes after a pretty rough patch, with prices hitting record highs. Many households in Kerala were feeling the pinch, especially with Onam celebrations around the corner.

unnormalised: Experts are saying the international crude oil situation is looking a little more stable. But they're also warning us not to get too comfortable, as global markets are as unpredictable as Mumbai traffic.
normalised: Experts are saying the international crude oil situation is looking a little more stable. But they're also warning us not to get too comfortable, as global markets are as unpredictable as Mumbai traffic.

unnormalised: So, for now, let's enjoy the (potential) savings. Fingers crossed this Diwali bonus sticks around for a while. Will it last till Chhath Puja? Only time will tell! Stay tuned for further updates. We will keep an eye on this like a hawk!
normalised: So, for now, let's enjoy the (potential) savings. Fingers crossed this Diwali bonus sticks around for a while. Will it last till Chhath Puja? Only time will tell! Stay tuned for further updates. We will keep an eye on this like a hawk!
